flavor: Millennia past powerful leShay allied themselves with the Imaskar, your enemy. With knowledge gained from this alliance, the Imaskari built great portals which they used to enslave the native peoples of other worlds. You are a reincarnated ancestor of one of these enslaved peoplesâ€”the Mulan. An angelic servant, you have come to Sarifal with vengeance in your heart. You will bring the fight to your enemy and your retribution will be swift and merciless.
name: Wrath Of The Ancients
